name: Ghost Camp
description:
Maiko Nakahara, 17 year old student, wakes up in the middle of the forest and discovers that her friends have disappeared. What kind of mystery will she unravel?

Music by Speaking Through Electricity

Controls
  • [A], [D] to move left and right
  • Tap [Shift] to run
  • [Q], [E] to change item slot
  • [F] to pick up an item
  • [Space] to examine place/examine item/talk
